page.title: 13TOURISM
page.content: In our area we have two motels. they are "The New Inn" and "The Bay Horse Inn." There is also a public house in Birstwith. It is called "The Station." We have a few bed and breakfast places. These are mostly farm houses. We have no camp sites, caravan sites, guest houses, cafes, restaurants or boarding houses. Tourists coming to this area generally stay at camp or caravan sites out of the area or stay in hotels in Harrogate. A few stay in the area. They stay at bed and breakfast places or camp in a friendly farmers field.
